  - name: AtEnd
    summary: |
      Text is truncated at the end of the text; extra graphemes that cannot fit
      into the space are replaced with .... Word boundaries are respected if
      possible.

      For example, if the control is between -> and Long text is truncated at the en and Long text is truncated at the en<-d of the last complete word

      The text will be:

      Long text is truncated at the en...
